content: lion brand pattern # 70506ad skill level beginner level 1 wool-ease® article #620 a 3 balls and wool-ease® chunky article #630 4 colors 2 balls each b c d e crochet hook - size q-19 **15 75 mm** afghan is crocheted with 2 strands held together throughout 1 of wool-ease and 1 of wool-ease chunky changing colors held together creates a blended stripe effect work in half_double_crochet u s following pattern color sequence fasten_off and weave in ends to finish
